Package org.kiji.schema.impl

Implementations for the main KijiSchema classes and interfaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
HBaseAdminFactory Factory for HBaseAdmin.
HTableInterfaceFactory Factory for HTableInterface instances.
LayoutConsumer Interface for classes which hold table layout references which must be updated in response to a table layout update.
 

Class Summary
AvroCellDecoder<T> Base class for decoders that read Kiji cells encoded using Avro.
AvroCellEncoder Serializes Avro cells to bytes for persistence in HBase.
BoundColumnReaderSpec Binding of a ColumnReaderSpec to a specific column.
CounterCellDecoder Cell decoder for counters.
CounterCellEncoder Encoder for Kiji counters.
DefaultKijiCellEncoderFactory Factory for cell encoders.
GenericCellDecoder<T> Decodes cells encoded using Avro into generic types.
KijiPaginationFilter A KijiColumnFilter that allows for pagination over the qualifiers in a row, along with other filters that are and-ed together.
MetadataRestorer The MetadataRestorer is responsible for backing up and restoring the metadata stored in Kiji's Meta, System, and Schema tables, including information about table layouts, schemas, and system variables.
ProtobufCellDecoder<T> Deserializes an HBase cell encoded as a Protocol Buffer.
ProtobufCellEncoder Serializes Protocol Buffers for persistence into an HBase cell.
RawBytesCellDecoder<T> Deserializes an HBase cell as a raw byte array.
RawBytesCellEncoder Encoder for Kiji cells that expose raw bytes to the user.
SpecificCellDecoder<T> Decodes cells encoded using Avro into specific types.
Versions System and layout versions known and used by Kiji.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidColumnNameException Thrown when kiji encounters a column name that is not valid.
 

Package org.kiji.schema.impl Description

Implementations for the main KijiSchema classes and interfaces.

Users generally shouldn't need to reference any of these classes directly, but rather use the classes presented by the org.kiji.schema package.
